name: Bamboonium
description: Paladin Pandas is a 10k NFT collection backed by play-to-earn NFT games including a PvE "Space Expedition" and a PvP game "Panda v. Panda". $BAMB is the token powering the whole ecosystem, that players earn $BAMB from mining PvE, loot other players' $BAMB in PvP, staking NFT to collect rental fee, stake $BAMB to earn interest, stake LP token to mine the liquidity mining pool. $BAMB will be granted with the future utilities to be consumed in NFT level-up, power raffle, online merch store, in-game marketplace and whitelist marketplace.
